description: Welcome to your home at Creekside! This beautifully finished 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom townhome offers 1,432 sqft of bright and functional living space. The open main floor features 9-foot ceilings, a spacious living and dining area, a gourmet kitchen with quartz countertops, a spacious island, stainless steel appliances, and ample storage. Thoughtful custom millwork provides style and functionality and gives this home a unique touch. Upstairs you'll find 3 generous bedrooms, including a primary suite with walk-in closet and ensuite. Enjoy a private outdoor space, perfect for relaxing or entertaining, plus the convenience of an attached garage. Nestled beside Siegel Creek, this sought-after community combines natural surroundings with close proximity to schools, shopping, parks, and transit.
